restcgi::request_hdr

restcgi::request_hdr Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for restcgi::request_hdr:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Request and general HTTP header fields.

See also:
http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec5.html#sec5.3
